Oh, hi! Welcome to my little corner of the internet, where you'll find a bunch of stuff I've done in my free time. Like, I don't know, data viz and stuff? I mean, it's not like I'm trying to impress you or anything. But yeah, take a look around if you want and if anything catches your eye, feel free to drop me a line. I'm always up for a chat about all things data.
